General.Name: BCEG Environmental Remediation Co. Ltd.
General.Description: BCEG Environmental Remediation Co., Ltd. provides environmental restoration services. The company offers soil remediation, pesticide contaminated site restoration, coking site restoration, petrochemical site restoration, and other services. It also provides site and groundwater restoration, mine repair, farmland improvement and restoration, and water body and heavy metal repair services. The company was incorporated in 2007 and is based in Beijing, China.
